name: Get_Hotel_Reviews(Tips)

docs_row.name: Get_Hotel_Reviews(Tips)
docs_row.func_description: Retrieve reviews and tips for a specified hotel.

hotel_id.description:
hotel_id can be retrieved from api/v1/hotels/searchHotels(Search Hotels) or api/v1/hotels/searchHotelsByCoordinates(Search Hotels By Coordinates
) endpoint in Hotels collection.

sort_option_id.description: sort_option_id can be retrieved from api/v1/hotels/getHotelReviewsSortOption(Get Hotel Reviews(Tips) Sort Option) endpoint in Hotels collection.

languagecode.description:
To obtain the response data in a specific language, enter the languagecode. languagecode can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLanguages(Get Languages
) endpoint in Meta collection.

hotel_id.description:
hotel_id can be retrieved from api/v1/hotels/searchHotels(Search Hotels) or api/v1/hotels/searchHotelsByCoordinates(Search Hotels By Coordinates
) endpoint in Hotels collection.

sort_option_id.description: sort_option_id can be retrieved from api/v1/hotels/getHotelReviewsSortOption(Get Hotel Reviews(Tips) Sort Option) endpoint in Hotels collection.

languagecode.description:
To obtain the response data in a specific language, enter the languagecode. languagecode can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLanguages(Get Languages
) endpoint in Meta collection.

result.title: Pleasant
result.hotelier_response: We are glad to have provided you with a pleasant experience. It is extremely inspiring for us to get to know from guests that they had a beautiful stay. Looking forward to hosting you soon again!

result.title: Pleasant
result.hotelier_response: We are glad to have provided you with a pleasant experience. It is extremely inspiring for us to get to know from guests that they had a beautiful stay. Looking forward to hosting you soon again!

We’re glad to hear that our staff was helpful and kind, and that you appreciated the convenience of our location near the airport. However, we apologize for the unpleasant experience you had with the hallway, and we truly appreciate you bringing it to our attention. We’ll take immediate action to address the cleanliness and maintenance issues to ensure a more comfortable stay for our future guests. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back soon.
result.title: Pleasant
result.pros: The hotel employees were very helpful and kind. It is possible to order breakfast for certain time. Really close to the aeroport.
result.cons: To reach our room, we had to go through really long hall that was extremely dusty, smelly and it looked like a part of a chair factory.

response_summary:
The hotel has received a total of 25 reviews, with three recent ones highlighted here. Guests can sort the reviews by "Most Relevant," "Date (Newer to Older)," or "Close to Property Score."  

Felipe, a solo traveler from Chile, stayed in a Deluxe Room for one night in May 2025 and rated his experience 2.8 out of 10. He appreciated the cleanliness but did not mention any major drawbacks. The hotel responded warmly, expressing gratitude for his feedback and hoping to welcome him back.  

Hitesh, visiting with a group of friends from India, also rated his stay 2.8 after spending four nights in March 2025. He enjoyed the breakfast but did not provide any negative comments. The hotel acknowledged his pleasant experience and looked forward to hosting him again.  

Eliška, a family traveler from the Czech Republic, stayed for two nights in February 2025. She praised the helpful staff and the hotel’s proximity to the airport but criticized the long, dusty, and unpleasant hallway leading to her room. The hotel apologized for the inconvenience and assured her that they would address the cleanliness and maintenance issues promptly.  

Overall, the reviews reflect mixed experiences, with guests appreciating certain aspects like cleanliness, breakfast, and staff hospitality, while some encountered issues with the hotel’s condition. The hotel has been responsive to feedback, aiming to improve guest satisfaction.
enhance_func_desc: This API is ideal for travelers researching hotel stays. It retrieves guest reviews for a specific hotel, allowing sorting by relevance, date, or proximity score. Users can view detailed feedback, including ratings, comments, and hotel responses, to assess overall guest satisfaction. The hotel ID must be obtained from the SearchHotels or SearchHotelsByCoordinates API.

enhanced_parameters.hotel_id: Unique identifier for the hotel, sourced from searchHotels or searchHotelsByCoordinates.
enhanced_parameters.sort_option_id: Sorts reviews by relevance, date, or proximity score.
enhanced_parameters.page_number: Specifies the pagination number for review results.
enhanced_parameters.languagecode: Language preference for the review content.

sort_options.description: List of available sorting options for reviews

ar_items.description: Details of a single sorting option

sort_option_id.description: Unique identifier for the sorting option

sort_option_default.description: Indicates if this is the default sorting option (1 for yes, 0 for no)

title.description: Display name of the sorting option

is_moderated.description: Indicates if the review has been moderated (1 for yes, 0 for no)

hotelier_response_date.description: Timestamp of the hotel's response to the review

is_incentivised.description: Indicates if the review was incentivized (1 for yes, 0 for no)

stayed_room_info.description: Details about the room the reviewer stayed in

url_max300.description: URL of the image with a maximum width of 300 pixels

url_square60.description: URL of the square image with 60 pixels width

url_640x200.description: URL of the image with dimensions 640x200 pixels

helpful_vote_count.description: Number of helpful votes the review has received

user_new_badges.description: List of new badges the user has earned

ar_items.description: Name or identifier of the badge

title_translated.description: Translated title of the review (if applicable)

no_user_title.description: Indicates if the user has no title (1 for yes, 0 for no)

ar_items.description: URL or identifier of the photo

review_hash.description: Unique hash identifier for the review

ar_items.description: Name or identifier of the tag

pros_translated.description: Translated pros of the review (if applicable)

average_score.description: Average score given by the reviewer

reviewng.description: Indicates if the review is positive (1) or negative (0)

travel_purpose.description: Purpose of the travel (e.g., leisure, business)

hotelier_response.description: Response from the hotel to the review

pros.description: Positive aspects mentioned in the review

cons.description: Negative aspects mentioned in the review

anonymous.description: Indicates if the review is anonymous

date.description: Date and time the review was posted

nr_reviews.description: Number of reviews the author has written

helpful_vote_count.description: Number of helpful votes the author has received

type_string.description: Type of traveler (e.g., Solo traveller, Group of friends)

type.description: Internal identifier for the type of traveler

avatar.description: URL of the reviewer's avatar image

cons_translated.description: Translated cons of the review (if applicable)
